name: Halloween Plannet
description:
Have fun in this newly discovered planet called Halloween Planet! yo can jump, and hit controlling the cute little space witch to help her get all the candy possible!

Controller
Jump: A-button
Walk: D-pad
Melee: X-button
Range: B-button
Shield: Rb

Keyboard

Jump: Space Bar
Walk: Arrow Keys
Melee: D
Range: W
Shield: R

Art made by the awesome Arilyn!
Instagram

Programing and sound effects by Luis Chacón.
